installCommand: npm install && mkdir -p node_modules/react-native-worklets && echo 'module.exports = function() { return { visitor: {} }; };' > node_modules/react-native-worklets/plugin.js && echo '{"name": "react-native-worklets", "version": "1.0.0", "main": "plugin.js"}' > node_modules/react-native-worklets/package.json
